    • Constructor Detail

      • AndroidXBeeInterface

        public AndroidXBeeInterface(android.content.Context context,
                            int baudRate)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new AndroidXBeeInterface object with the given parameters.

        This constructor requires all methods calling open() method to be executed in a thread different than the UI to avoid hangs while waiting for USB device permissions.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        baudRate - Device baud rate to use.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 1.
        NullPointerException - if context == null.
        See Also:
        AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, AndroidUSBPermissionListener), AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, UsbDevice), AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, UsbDevice, AndroidUSBPermissionListener)

      • AndroidXBeeInterface

        public AndroidXBeeInterface(android.content.Context context,
                            int baudRate,
                            AndroidUSBPermissionListener permissionListener)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new AndroidXBeeInterface object with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        baudRate - Device baud rate to use.
        permissionListener - Android USB permission listener to be notified when access to USB device is granted, may be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 1.
        NullPointerException - if context == null.
        See Also:
        AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int), AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, UsbDevice), AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, UsbDevice, AndroidUSBPermissionListener), AndroidUSBPermissionListener

      • AndroidXBeeInterface

        public AndroidXBeeInterface(android.content.Context context,
                            int baudRate,
                            android.hardware.usb.UsbDevice usbDevice)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new AndroidXBeeInterface object with the given parameters.

        This constructor requires that methods calling open() method to be executed in a thread different than the UI to avoid hangs while waiting for USB device permissions.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        baudRate - Device baud rate to use.
        usbDevice - USB device to use, may be null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 1.
        NullPointerException - if context == null.
        See Also:
        AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int), AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, AndroidUSBPermissionListener), AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, UsbDevice, AndroidUSBPermissionListener), UsbDevice

      • AndroidXBeeInterface

        public AndroidXBeeInterface(android.content.Context context,
                            int baudRate,
                            android.hardware.usb.UsbDevice usbDevice,
                            AndroidUSBPermissionListener permissionListener)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new AndroidXBeeInterface object with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        baudRate - Device baud rate to use.
        usbDevice - USB device to use, may be null.
        permissionListener - Android USB permission listener to be notified when access to USB device is granted, may be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 1.
        NullPointerException - if context == null.
        See Also:
        AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int), AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, AndroidUSBPermissionListener), AndroidXBeeInterface(Context, int, UsbDevice), AndroidUSBPermissionListener, UsbDevice

      • open

        public void open()
          throws InterfaceInUseException,
                 InvalidInterfaceException,
                 InvalidConfigurationException,
                 PermissionDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: IConnectionInterface
        Attempts to open the connection interface.
        Specified by:
        open in interface IConnectionInterface
        Throws:
        InterfaceInUseException - if the interface is in use by other application(s).
        InvalidInterfaceException - if the interface is invalid or does not exist.
        InvalidConfigurationException - if the configuration used to open the interface is invalid.
        PermissionDeniedException - if you do not have permissions to access the interface.
        See Also:
        IConnectionInterface.close(), IConnectionInterface.isOpen()

      • readData

        public int readData(byte[] data,
                    int offset,
                    int length)
             throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: IConnectionInterface
        Reads the given number of bytes at the given offset from the connection interface and stores it in the provided byte array returning the number of read bytes.
        Specified by:
        readData in interface IConnectionInterface
        Parameters:
        data - The byte array to store the read data.
        offset - The start offset in data array at which the data is written.
        length - Maximum number of bytes to read.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes read.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is any problem reading from the input stream.
        See Also:
        IConnectionInterface.readData(byte[])
